metadata.title: CVE-2023-36268 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description: An issue in The Document Foundation Libreoffice v.7.4.7 allows a remoteattacker to cause a denial of service via a crafted .ppt file.

criterions.comment: libreoffice package in focal is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
